summary: REQ-37 appears implemented in RoomsPage.tsx via exact room.id matching with a trimmed query and no filtering when the trimmed query is empty. The diff snippet does not provide evidence for the requested user-facing copy updates (REQ-38) or the ID-specific empty-state messaging (REQ-39). Two non-requested documentation/state-tracking files were also modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update user-facing copy in the Rooms search dialog to clearly indicate the search input expects a room ID (unique ID), including dialog description and input placeholder text.
missing_requirements.reason: RoomsPage.tsx is truncated before any DialogDescription / placeholder text changes are shown; the provided snippet contains filtering and handlers but no visible copy updates for the search dialog.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Rooms empty-state messaging so that when a non-empty room ID search returns no results, the helper text indicates no room was found for that ID.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided RoomsPage.tsx snippet does not include the empty-state rendering branch (when filteredRooms is empty) or any helper text changes; file content is truncated before UI rendering details.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking state for this change in project_state.json (new_feature_requests entries AR-1..AR-4 marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any changes to project_state.json or project tracking metadata; it only specifies functional/frontend copy changes on RoomsPage.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated generated documentation/summary file frontend-file-summaries.txt describing multiple frontend files and claiming new behaviors.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request modifications to repository summary documentation files; only RoomsPage search behavior/copy/empty state were requested.
